content.raw:
I downloaded a new Docker image and now I get errors \(which have already also been mentioned in the resolved issue #168\).

Running the docker with only one robot with:

`./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X3_TB robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

and then starting our nodes, I get many errors like:

> \[X3\_TB\] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker  
> \[CommsClient\] Retrying register..  
> \[X3\_TB\] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker  
> \[CommsClient\] Retrying register..  
> \[X3\_TB\] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker  
> \[CommsClient\] Retrying register..  
> \[X3\_TB\] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker  
> \[CommsClient\] Retrying register..

Using an 4 day old image with 

`./run.bash a28b5c00f6ab tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X3_TB robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

no errors occur when starting our nodes.
content.html:
I downloaded a new Docker image and now I get errors (which have already also been mentioned in the resolved issue #168).

Running the docker with only one robot with:

./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X3_TB robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

and then starting our nodes, I get many errors like:

[X3_TB] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker
[CommsClient] Retrying register..
[X3_TB] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker
[CommsClient] Retrying register..
[X3_TB] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker
[CommsClient] Retrying register..
[X3_TB] CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker
[CommsClient] Retrying register..

Using an 4 day old image with

./run.bash a28b5c00f6ab tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X3_TB robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

no errors occur when starting our nodes.
